1.title: Mother's Day Shop & Deal of the Day: Anne Klein Watches
1.plot: Tonight, we're teaming up with Amazon Fashion to share the best gifts for moms. Then, it's our deal of the day: up to 60% off select Anne Klein watches. Later, Frankie chats with the multi-talented Lea Michele.

2.title: Mother's Day Device Deals & #TuesdayShoesday
2.plot: Frankie's sharing the best deals on Amazon devices for Mother's Day, like the Alexa-enabled Fire HD 8 tablet and more. Plus, we've got another hot shoe trend for spring in this week's #tuesdayshoesday.

4.title: Deals of the Day: Denim & Gold Jewelry & Trend-to-Try Thursday

5.title: Style Code Live Rewind
5.plot: The weekend is finally here. Catch up with the week's best in fashion and beauty in our rewind episode.

1.title: Style Code Live Premiere
1.plot: Join us for the premiere of Style Code Live! We will bring you the latest trends in fashion & beauty each weeknight at 9 ET / 6 PT. Tonight Danielle Bernstein from WeWoreWhat reveals her three fashion must-haves for spring. Plus, we're talking about red lips - the beauty look of the moment.

2.title: Print Mixing & Meghan Trainor
2.plot: It's all about that bass tonight on Style Code Live! Special guest Meghan Trainor joins us live in studio to talk about her new single "No." We'll also walk you through the do's and dont's of mixing prints and show you makeup tricks that will up your social media game.

3.title: Jumpsuits & Hottest Hair Gadgets

Weigh in during the live chat to tell us more! Plus, Frankie chats with "The Americans" star Keri Russell and gets the scoop on the upcoming season.

Today, Fashion Designer, Angela Simmons is in the studio giving us major fashion tips to achieve the "cool girl" street style look. Plus, were talking about multi-masking - the hottest beauty trick to transition your skin into spring.

1.title: Sport Style & 6 Steps to Fuller Hair
1.plot: Live tonight: how to mix some sporty cool into your everyday look. Then, we're showing you 6 ways to make your mane healthy and fuller.

2.title: Jackie O Style & Spring Color Preview
2.plot: Tonight, we're taking it back to Camelot with ways to look like a demure First Lady. Next, the freshest new hues for spring and how to work them into your look.

3.title: Perfect Pairings: Military & Florals & Workout-to-Workday Beauty
3.plot: Tonight, we'll show you how to expertly mix feminine florals with military-inspired pieces. Plus, beauty tips to take you from the gym to the office.

4.title: Spring Block Heels & Day-to-Night Makeup
4.plot: Tonight, Adam Glassman guest hosts as we show you the best of spring's block-heel styles. Next up, the perfect beauty looks for day to night.

5.title: Style Code Live Rewind
5.plot: Celebrate Friday with us as we rewind the week's best in style and beauty.

6.title: Spring Bomber & SCL Staff Obsessions
6.plot: Tonight, Tara Marzuki shows us spring bomber jackets to love. Then our staff shares their can't-live-without-'em products. Plus, tonight we're playing our Shopping Spree Giveaway.

7.title: Shirt Dresses & Beauty Tools to Try
7.plot: Watch live as Zanita shows you the how-tos of shirt dressing and later, we're highlighting the best beauty tools to try. Plus, tonight we're playing our Shopping Spree Giveaway.

8.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy & Mules
8.plot: Tonight, we're chatting with Maks from DWTS. Next up: Marni Harvey shows how to rock a fur jacket. Then, we're dreaming of spring as Melanie Pace shares the cutest mules for the season. Plus, it's the last night of our Shopping Spree Giveaway.

9.title: Tamar Braxton & Style Code Live Rewind
9.plot: Watch as we catch up with Tamar Braxton, then we're looking back on the week's best in fashion and beauty.

10.title: Spring Into Gorgeous Skin & Deal of the Day: Men's Suits & More
10.plot: Tonight, Dr. Dendy Engelman shows how to greet spring with luminous skin. Later, Preston Konrad shares his picks from our deal of the day: up to 70% off men's suits and more.

11.title: Deal of the Day: PUMA & Blooming Beauty Trends
11.plot: Tonight, Christine Bibbo-Herr picks her faves from our deal of the day: up to 50% on select PUMA styles. Then, celebrity makeup artist Andrew Sotomayor shows blooming beauty trends for spring and Something Navy shares her workout style.

12.title: Deal of the Day: Levi's for Less & Eva Gutowski
12.plot: Refresh your spring look with our deal of the day: up to 50% off select Levi's styles. Then, Eva Gutowski shares her travel beauty essentials.

13.title: Deal of the Day: Swarovski Sparkle & Messy Hair Don't Care
13.plot: Tonight's deal of the day is all about sparkle: up to 60% off on select Swarovski pieces. Then, hair stylist Michiko Boorberg shares "messy" hair looks inspired by the latest trends. And don't miss Tati's product of the week.

14.title: Style Code Live Rewind
14.plot: TGIF. Catch up with SCL as we rewind the week's best in style and beauty.

15.title: Trend Alert: Embroidery & 1st, 2nd & 3rd Date Makeup
15.plot: Tonight, Preston Konrad guest hosts as we share a hot spring trend: embroidered details. Later, makeup artist Sarah Appleby's gorgeous beauty looks for dates 1 through 3. And Lara Eurodolian shows the best way to clean your makeup brushes.

16.title: Dresses Under $100 & Customize Your Cat Eye
16.plot: Preston Konrad is back to guest host and we're sharing our fave dress picks under $100. Later, makeup artist Tiffany Saxby shows how to customize your cat eye in our Tuesday Tutorial-plus, it's #TuesdayShoesday.

17.title: Glamping & Smile Tips & Tricks
17.plot: Our deal of the day is up to 40% off Merrell shoes, and we'll show you how to take 'em glamping. Later, we're chatting with Jenna Elfman, Lori Hamlin Penske shares some tips and tricks for a beautiful smile, and it's Watch and Win Wednesday.

18.title: Deal of the Day: Jeans & Joggers & Pretty Palettes
18.plot: Tonight, Jeannie Mai guests hosts as we share our deal of the day: up to 50% off jeans and joggers. Plus, blogger Pink Peonies highlights top spring accessories and makeup artist Joey Camasta reveals the prettiest palettes for the season.

19.title: Style Code Live Rewind
19.plot: Enjoy your Fri-yay with us as we look back at the week's best in style and beauty.

1.title: Color Crush: Orange & Travel Mini Must-Haves
1.plot: Tonight, we're sharing our fave picks in the color of the moment: orange. Then, take a look at our mini must-haves for traveling. Plus, see how we're styling over-the-knee boots with fresh florals.

2.title: Color Pairings: Pink & Red & Glitter Strobing
2.plot: Before the show, style stars Margo and Me and Carly Cristman's closet peeks. Then, Dallas Shaw's perfect spring pairings and our Tutorial Tuesday: glitter strobing. Later, Something Navy serves up stunning date-night style.

3.title: Festival Fashion & Sara Happ - Lush Lips
3.plot: Tonight: festival-ready looks we're loving and we chat with Sara Happ about how to get supersoft lips. Later, Adir Abergel's how-to on a sexy updo and it's *Watch and Win Wednesday. *See Style Links for Rules. No purch necessary.

4.title: Blowout Boosters & All Wrapped Up
4.plot: Tonight, blowout boosters with David Lopez and how to rock a fresh trend: pajama dressing (trust us). Next, Lara Eurdolian's tips to clean makeup brushes and the season's best strappy sandals.

5.title: Style Code Live Rewind
5.plot: Watch, shop, and chat with us as we rewind the week's best in fashion and beauty.

6.title: Updated Sneakers & Cool Festival Braids
6.plot: Watch as we share our favorite new takes on classic kicks and Frankie reveals his Monday must-have. Later, we'll show you eye-catching braids to rock while you're rocking out at a festival.

7.title: Color Pairings: Pink & Red & Statement Eyeliner
7.plot: Tonight, Tara Marzuki is back to show stylish ways to mix pink and red, Something Navy is in Palm Springs (fun!), and Emily Luciano shares the festival looks she's loving. Plus, it's #TuesdayShoesday.

8.title: April Showers & Skin-Cleansing Combos
8.plot: Tonight: the best rainy-day looks, plus skin-cleansing combos you need. Later, Kaitlyn Bristowe gets date-night ready and it's *Watch and Win Wednesday. *See Style Links for Rules. No purch necessary.

9.title: Steve Madden & Body-Baring Prep
9.plot: Tonight, Steve Madden (yes, THE Steve Madden) joins us in the studio, plus Pink Peonies is sharing a special deal: 25% off any shade of Elizabeth Arden Beautiful Color lipstick. Later, how to prep your skin for all those warm-weather looks you'll be wearing.

10.title: Style Code Live Rewind
10.plot: Woo-it's Friday. Kick back and get ready for the weekend while we rewind the week's best in fashion and beauty.

11.title: Prime Exclusive: Up to 50% Off Women's Spring Clothing & Customize Your Crimp
11.plot: Tonight, we've got a Prime-exclusive deal: up to 50% off on select women's spring styles. Later, watch Margo and Me's stylish festival adventures, and later, celebrity hairstylist Paul Cucinello shows us how to customize your crimp.

12.title: Single-Shoulder Staples & Brows on Fleek
12.plot: Tonight, one-shoulder styles you need heading into spring and summer, Ashlee Glazer's tips on finding the perfect neutral lipstick, and up your brow game with makeup artist Landy Dean. Plus, Brandi Cyrus gives us a peek into her festival prep.

13.title: Redbook Beauty School & Skechers Deal
13.plot: Tory Kirby from Redbook is in-studio to teach us the best routines your skin. Plus, our deal of the day is Skechers under $35. Later, we chat with Bella Thorne and check in with Brandi Cyrus at Coachella.

14.title: Spring Toppers & 5-Star Beauty
14.plot: Tonight, we chat with Lucy Hale from Pretty Little Liars and Pink Peonies shows us adorable mommy-daughter looks. Later, perfect spring toppers, top-rated beauty products and Becca Tilley checks in from-you guessed it-Coachella.

15.title: Style Code Live Rewind
15.plot: You made it to the weekend. Reward yourself with our rewind of the week's best in fashion and beauty, plus a look at style star Marta Pozzan's festival faves.

16.title: Peekaboo Lace Dresses & Best Beauty Organizers
16.plot: Tonight, stylish Aya Kanai shows us the prettiest peekaboo lace dresses for spring. Later, check out our picks for the best beauty organizers around.

17.title: Our Favorite Flats & Fake Lashes
17.plot: Tonight, we're sharing our faves from the fresh crop of cute, comfy spring flats. Later, we'll show you our tips and tricks on applying fake lashes like a pro, and later, we chat with Kelly Osbourne.

18.title: Redbook Beauty School: Eye Trends of the Moment & Deal of the Day: Handbags
18.plot: Tonight, Redbook Beauty School and Sir John are giving us expert tips on how to get the season's most stunning eyes. Plus, our deal of the day is up to 50% off our spring handbag picks. Later, hair guru Adir Abergel shares his expert secrets for backcombing.

19.title: Deal of the Day: Designer Jewelry & Watches & New Knots
19.plot: Tonight, save on select designer jewelry and watches with our deal of the day: up to 60% off. Later, Giovanni Vaccaro from the Glam Squad is sharing cool new knotted 'dos and actress and model Charlotte McKinney joins us in the studio.

20.title: Style Code Live Rewind
20.plot: What time is it? It's time to rewind. Greet the weekend with our look back at the week's best in fashion and beauty.

-1.title: Episode dated 13 February 2017
-1.plot: Carrie Keagan joins as guest host, plus Rachel's in LA sharing the hottest looks from the Grammys. Then, we talk ruffles with our favorite blogger Rach Parcell of Pink Peonies and sharing ways to work rose gold into your beauty look.

imdb.plot outline: Style Code Live is a daily, live show where style enthusiasts can connect, chat, shop, and get the inside scoop on the latest fashion and beauty trends. Each day designers, bloggers, beauty experts and celebrities will reveal their secrets for making today's looks work for you.
imdb.title: Style Code Live
plot: _Style Code Live_ (qv) is a daily, live show where style enthusiasts can connect, chat, shop, and get the inside scoop on the latest fashion and beauty trends. Each day designers, bloggers, beauty experts and celebrities will reveal their secrets for making today's looks work for you.
